metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7300 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: The Binary File Descriptor (BFD) library (aka libbfd), as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.28, has an aout_link_add_symbols function in bfd/aoutx.h that is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer over-read (off-by-one) because of an incomplete check for invalid string offsets while loading symbols, leading to a GNU linker (ld) program crash.

criterions.comment: binutils package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.28-1ubuntu1').
